settings.text: 44 is the shadow you feel, not the light you see. Born from pain, built on truth — we don’t chase the crown, we carry it. Brick by brick, we stand where others fall. Harlem’s heart, Gotham’s grit. We speak in silence, strike with purpose. This ain’t for show — it’s for those who know. Loyalty. Legacy. Power. 44 forever.

custom_css: p {background: #0a0a0a; color: #f1f1f1; font-family: Cinzel, serif; text-transform: uppercase; text-align: center; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.6; font-weight: bold;}
